title: Bandelier National Monument: Photo Gallery
body: Photo Gallery       Below find an assortment of images from Bandelier.  Each image may be downloaded either as a high resolution tif (perfect for publications) or a jpeg (make good computer wallpaper).  Please credit the NPS for photo use.        photo by sally king  Tyuonyi Village from the Frey Trail   TIF JPEG        photo by sally king  Park Entrance Sign in Winter   TIF JPEG        photo by sally king  Trail at Tsankawi   TIF JPEG        photo by sally king  Lower Falls   TIF JPEG        photo by sally king  Prescribed Burn In Frijoles Canyon   TIF JPEG        photo by sally king  Abert's Squirrel   TIF JPEG
